title: NxAWSCdk Deploy
description: Deploy an app via the `cdk` cli command.

profile.description: Use the indicated AWS profile as the default environment

stackName.description: The name of the cdk stack you want to execute on

build-exclude.description: Do not rebuild asset with the given ID. Can be specified multiple times

exclusively.description: Only deploy requested stacks, don't include dependencies

require-approval.description: What security-sensitive changes need manual approval

notification-arns.description: ARNs of SNS topics that CloudFormation will notify with stack related events

change-set-name.description: Name of the CloudFormation change set to create

output.description: Directory in which to place the synthesizer output.

force.description: Always deploy stack even if templates are identical

parameters.description: Additional parameters passed to CloudFormation at deploy time (STACK:KEY=VALUE)

output-file.description: Path to file where stack outputs will be written as JSON

previous-parameters.description: Use previous values for existing parameters (you must specify all parameters on every deployment if this is disabled)

progress.description: Display mode for stack activity events

no-rollback.description: Don't Rollback stack to stable state on failure
